title: Pottery ladies. Part 4
creator_credit: Jenny Wilkes, Elizabeth Taylor-Mead and Arts Council of Great Britain
brief_description: Focuses on Susie Cooper and the women employed to manufacture pottery under her direction. Offers an insight into design techniques and production from an economic perspective and examines the impact of war and post war economics on designers and the pottery industry. Interviews with Susie Cooper, Gordon Elliot, Ann Eatwell (Victoria and Albert Museum) and Peggy Davies.
